DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic type for a slab that is specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given specifically for the predefined types. > NOTE  The _PredefinedType_ shall only be used, if no _IfcSlabType_ is assigned, providing its own _IfcSlabType.PredefinedType_.
{ .change-ifc2x} > IFC2x CHANGE The attribute has been changed into an OPTIONAL attribute.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcSlabType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcSlabTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcSlabTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no slab type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcSlabType_.
